price: Lau wangeli kuwamo humo miungu wengine isipo kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu basi bila ya shaka hizo mbingu na ardhi zingeli fisidika. Subahana 'Llah Ametakasika Mwenyezi Mungu, Bwana wa A'rshi (Kiti cha Enzi), na hayo wanayo yazua.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
footnotes: Lau kuwa mbinguni na duniani kuna miungu isipo kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu wanao endesha mambo yao, basi ingeli haribika nidhamu iliyo simamishiwa hizo mbingu na ardhi kwa kuumbwa, na ikafikilia mwisho wa mpango na hikima. Basi na atakasike Mwenyezi Mungu, Mwenye Ufalme wote, na yote wanayo msingizia washirikina.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
